thread.title: Unite Private Networks to Speak at the 2015 Texas Data Center Summit
thread.title_full: Unite Private Networks to Speak at the 2015 Texas Data Center Summit

author: admin
title: Unite Private Networks to Speak at the 2015 Texas Data Center Summit
text:
Unite Private Networks 
DALLAS, TX -- (Marketwired) -- 09/30/15 -- Unite Private Networks (UPN) announced today its participation at the third annual Texas Data Center Summit held at the Renaissance Dallas Hotel in Dallas, Texas, October 6-7. 
UPN's Vice President of Enterprise Sales, Steve Hartman will be participate in an executive panel discussion on Wednesday, October 7 at 2:45 p.m. The session will explore dark and lit fiber and the future of asset-bundling including, go-to-market strategies, pricing and product offerings. 
"Cloud backup requirements and HIPPA regulations are driving many clients to a data center backup solution," said Steve Hartman, Vice President of Enterprise Sales at Unite Private Networks. "UPN specializes in dark fiber and high-capacity lit services, and I am excited to share our story with other industry leaders." 
The Texas Data Center Summit has become the premier regional conference series for data center real estate and technology infrastructure executives. For more information about the 2015 Summit, please visit http://cre-events.com/dctx2015/ . 
About Unite Private Networks: UPN provides high-bandwidth, fiber-based communications networks and services to schools, governments, carriers, data centers, hospitals, and enterprise business customers across a 20 state service area. Service offerings include dark and lit fiber, private line, optical Ethernet, Internet access, data center services, and other customized solutions. Headquartered in Kansas City, MO, UPN has been providing customer focused communications solutions since 1998. For more information, visit www.uniteprivatenetworks.com . 
About the Texas Data Center Summit: The National Data Center Summit Series is expanding with more valuable market intelligence and networking opportunities in 2015. The nation's premier data center conference series will be held on October 6-7 with The Third Annual Texas Data Center Summit in Dallas. The summit will feature an opening night reception on October 6, and the full-day conference at The Renaissance Dallas Hotel on October 7. The Summit will bring together the leading data center real estate and technology infrastructure executives from Dallas, San Antonio, Houston, Austin and from around the nation. Contact:
